DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the trial is to assess the bioavailability of Faldaprevir soft capsule with single oral dose and multiple oral doses in Chinese subjects
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics of Faldaprevir of Soft Capsule
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Healthy male and female subjects Exclusion criteria: Any relevant deviation from healthy conditionsAny relevant deviation from healthy conditions
